A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Longtime fans will be disappointed that there is no lightsaber duel in this movie and that Rian Johnson’s understanding of physics (a central plot point) is so poor\, it makes George Lucas look like Neils degrasse Tyson. The film is missing the swashbuckling sense of adventure of previous films\, and instead has an odd mix of millennial romantic angst\, misplaced slapstick comedy\, and heavy handed themes around heroes\, leadership\, and the past. It’s unclear if this movie will go down as the worst Star Wars film (which depends largely on if J.J. can salvage what remains for IX)\, but it is certainly the most divisive.
